burlap.behavior.stochasticgame.agents.interfacing.singleagent

Class SGToSADomain.SAActionWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.oomdp.singleagent.Action
      • burlap.behavior.stochasticgame.agents.interfacing.singleagent.SGToSADomain.SAActionWrapper
  • Enclosing class:
    SGToSADomain

    protected class SGToSADomain.SAActionWrapper
extends Action
    A single agent action wrapper for a stochastic game action. Calling this action will cause it to call the corresponding single interface to inform it of the action selection. The consructed action will have the same name and object parameterization specification as the source stochastic game SingleAction object.
    Author:
    James MacGlashan

    • Method Detail

      • performActionHelper

        protected State performActionHelper(State s,
                        java.lang.String[] params)
        Description copied from class: Action
        This method determines what happens when an action is applied in the given state with the given parameters. The State object s may be directly modified in this method since the parent method first copies the input state to pass to this helper method. The resulting state (which may be s) should then be returned.
        Specified by:
        performActionHelper in class Action
        Parameters:
        s - the state to perform the action on
        params - a String array specifying the action object parameters
        Returns:
        the resulting State from performing this action
